front.title: COPS Extension for GSS-API based Authentication Support

abstract.t: This document defines a security mechanism for the COPS protocolbased on Generic Security Service Application Program Interfaceframework [RFC 2078]. The COPS policy server (Policy Decision Pointor PDP) and the policy client (Policy Enforcement Point or PEP) canuse the security mechanism defined in this draft for mutualauthentication and for exchanging integrity protected messages withreplay protection.
